file_content.text: Uh, oh. Crysta's calling on an emergency channel. Better patch her through....
Finally! You're some hard critters to pin down.
Ignore my recording for Tatooine, hunter. Everything's changed. That slicer selling the Great Hunt list started a trend.
Somebody told your target he was a marked man. Naturally, he decided to make himself scarce.
I don't care if he knows I'm coming. Just tell me who he is.
Give me his name.
What a hassle.
If you don't hustle, he'll disappear--and you'll be out of the Great Hunt.
I can't wait to get my hands on that Mandalorian snob who did this.
Not "somebody"--Tarro.
First things first. You got to nail this target before he vanishes.
You're after Tyresius Lokai, a scoundrel who's been on the galaxy's most wanted list forever.
"The" Tyresius Lokai? That smuggler cheated the Hutt Cartel, Exchange and Black Sun gangs out of a fortune.
And he's been buying himself out of trouble ever since.
Two days ago, your rival bounty hunter shot down Tyresius's ship over Tatooine but then lost him in the desert.
That means Tyresius is still here.
So he hasn't left.
There ain't reports of him being someplace else.
Got any intel on this other hunter?
Rival, huh?
Already told you everything the Huntmaster lets me. Focus on Tyresius, and you'll surely bump into him.
Sounds like my competition has the brains of a bantha.
The other hunter is an idiot.
Tyresius can make even the smart hunters look like fools. Remember that.
The good news is Tyresius is Devaronian. He shouldn't be hard to spot.
That's true. I've seen two Devaronians my whole life. They've got red skin and two big horns on their heads.
Talk to the spaceport traffic control droid at Mos Ila. Find out if any Devaronians have been through there recently.
Spaceport droid. Mos Ila. Got it.
Sounds like a plan.
Tatooine is a giant desert. Not many places to hide.
Where else would he go?
Oh, you'd be surprised. Tatooine's a lot more than sand and sun.
The only way that Devaronian gets off Tatooine is in pieces.
I'll find him.
That's the spirit!
Tyresius has a reputation for being slippery; when you catch him, better hold on tight.
Good luck, hunter--Crysta out.
